scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn firebaserc && parcel build src/index.ts --dist-dir lib
scripts.build:dev: yarn firebaserc && parcel build src/index.ts --dist-dir lib
scripts.build:watch: yarn firebaserc && parcel watch src/index.ts --dist-dir lib
scripts.clean: npx rimraf lib misc/firebaserc.d.ts misc/firebaserc.d.ts.map misc/firebaserc.js misc/firebaserc.js.map misc/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo
scripts.start: yarn build:dev && GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS="../../service-account.json" firebase functions:config:get > .runtimeconfig.json && GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS="../../service-account.json" firebase emulators:start --only functions
